text: Begenyash () is a rural locality (a village) in Pervomaysky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 290 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 36 km from Sterlitamak, 6 km from Pervomayskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Begenyash
